alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lake and northwestern Orange Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 710 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lisbon, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Eustis, Tavares, Mount Dora and Howey-In-the-hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County
